title: Anyone tried base Stat boosting Mord?
body:
By this I mean items like Ravenous Hydra(base hp regen), Steraks (base ad), ect, paired with some pen.

Anyone tried it?
I'm at work and can't try it, but maybe it would let us see what Morde would be like with good base stats, lol. Try it and let me know

replies.body:
Not if you use the active for double AA reseting and for killing low hp champs with the active as well. 

Plus, if you start Doran sheild, than go for regen bead and long sword, your hp regen is OP early with a w that has early points put into it.

If you go Ravenous Hydra into Steraks and Triforce it's OP. Than Rylias and Liandries with a Portobello and sudden impact rune... OP, prepare for new shots and OP ghosts

hydra is pretty huge waste of 3500gold on Morde.
Champs only go hydra for wave clear, Morde already has wave clear.
Steraks + Triforce is decent on him. hydra not so much
